name: DailySignal
text:
RT @elishamaldonado: This, by my friend, @wjmcgurn. Beautiful.

Jimmy "is where he is today because he chose handcuffs and arrest rather than run away or abandon his convictions. All Hong Kong knows this. They also know that if even a billionaire isn’t safe, no one is."

https://t.co/TotpZooxWA

name: DailySignal
text:
Do you know how hard it is to teach French without using pronouns?

This teacher gave it a shot to accommodate a transgender student... but he slipped up once.

And then he was fired.

Full story: https://t.co/Gwhn4pQDAf https://t.co/PEi7k66Bzm
